snippet: The preacher, Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, has been held in a highly secure wing of the Metropolitan Correctional Center since his extradition from Britain in October.
lead_paragraph: The preacher, Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, has been held in a highly secure wing of the Metropolitan Correctional Center since his extradition from Britain in October.

headline.seo: New Restrictions Imposed on Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, Lawyers Say
headline.main: Harsh New Restrictions Imposed on Muslim Cleric, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: Harsh New Restrictions Imposed on Muslim Cleric, Lawyers Say
